creditline: Gift of the Nivin and Duncan MacMillan Foundation
description: black and white images of flowers with pair of horizontally placed tulips at top below an ovoid cartouche with scroll edging at top center, with hand-written text in German; pairs of flowers on stems at left and right center; strawberry-like elements on stems at bottom corners; tulip at bottom center with a black beetle to right of flower; variegated, blotchy washes of color--orang, blue and tan/olive green; some hand-written text in German--some text backwards
medium: Transfer lithograph and Xerox printing on handmade paper and Chinese rice paper, with chine collé and overpainting with high-pigmented inks
title: Barockes Welttheater (Daniel Pfisterer's Baroque World Theater)
